mc.name: Aladdin's Lamp

mc.name: Aladdin's Ring

mc.name: Amulet of Kroog

mc.printedText: {2}, {T}: Prevent 1 damage to any creature or player.
mc.flavorText: Among the first allies Urza gained were the people of Kroog. As a sign of friendship, Urza gave the healers of the city potent amulets; afterwards, thousands journeyed to Kroog in hope of healing.

mc.name: Armageddon Clock

At the beginning of your draw step, Armageddon Clock deals damage to each player equal to the number of doom counters on it.
{4}: Remove a doom counter from Armageddon Clock. Any player may play this ability but only during any upkeep step.

At the end of your upkeep, Armageddon Clock deals X damage to each player, where X is the number of doom counters on Armageddon Clock. Comes into play tapped.

mc.name: Bog Imp

mc.printedText: Flying
mc.flavorText: On guard for larger dangers, we underestimated the power and speed of the Imp's muck-crusted claws.

mc.name: Bog Wraith
mc.oracleText: Swampwalk (This creature is unblockable as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
mc.printedText: Swampwalk
mc.flavorText:
'Twas in the bogs of Cannelbrae
My mate did meet an early grave
'Twas nothing left for us to save
In the peat-filled bogs of Cannelbrae.

mc.name: Carrion Ants
mc.oracleText: {1}: Carrion Ants gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {1}: +1/+1 until end of turn
mc.flavorText: "War is no picnic," my father liked to say. But the Ants seemed to disagree.

mc.name: Cosmic Horror
mc.oracleText:
First strike
At the beginning of your upkeep, unless you pay {3}{B}{B}{B}, sacrifice Cosmic Horror and it deals 7 damage to you.
mc.printedText:
First strike
During your upkeep, pay {3}{B}{B}{B} or destroy Cosmic Horror. If you destroy Cosmic Horror in this way, it deals 7 damage to you.
mc.flavorText: ". . . Screams of horror rend th' affrighted skies."Alexander Pope, The Rape of the Lock

mc.name: Cursed Land
mc.oracleText:
Enchant land
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted land's controller, Cursed Land deals 1 damage to that player.
mc.printedText: Cursed Land deals 1 damage to target land's controller during his or her upkeep.

mc.name: Cyclopean Mummy
mc.oracleText: When Cyclopean Mummy is put into a graveyard from play, remove Cyclopean Mummy from the game.
mc.printedText: If Mummy is put into the graveyard from play, remove it from the game.
mc.flavorText: The ritual of plucking out an eye to gain future sight is but a curse that enables the living to see their own deaths.

mc.name: Dark Ritual
mc.oracleText: Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText: Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.

mc.name: Deathgrip
mc.oracleText: {B}{B}: Counter target green spell.
mc.printedText: {B}{B}: Counter target green spell. Play this ability as an interrupt.

mc.name: Deathlace
mc.oracleText: Target spell or permanent becomes black. (Mana symbols on that permanent remain unchanged.)
mc.printedText: Change the color of target spell or target permanent to black. Costs to cast, tap, maintain, or use a special ability of target remain unchanged.

mc.name: Drain Life
mc.oracleText:
Spend only black mana on X.

Drain Life deals X damage to target creature or player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt, but not more life than the player's life total before Drain Life dealt damage or the creature's toughness.
mc.printedText: Drain Life deals 1 damage to a target creature or player for each {B} you pay in addition to the casting cost. You then gain 1 life for each 1 damage dealt. You cannot gain more life than the toughness of the creature or the total life of the player Drain Life damages.

mc.name: Drudge Skeletons
mc.oracleText: {B}: Regenerate Drudge Skeletons. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)
mc.printedText: {B}: Regenerate
mc.flavorText: Bones scattered around us joined to form misshapen bodies. We struck at them repeatedly--they fell, but soon formed again, with the same mocking look on their faceless skulls.

mc.name: El-Hajjj
mc.oracleText: Lifelink (Whenever this creature deals damage, you gain that much life.)
mc.printedText: Gain 1 life for every 1 damage El-Hajjaj deals. You cannot gain more life in this way than the toughness of the creature or the total life of the player that El-Hajjaj damages.

mc.name: Erg Raiders
mc.oracleText: At the end of your turn, if Erg Raiders didn't attack this turn, Erg Raiders deals 2 damage to you unless it came under your control this turn.
mc.printedText: If you do not attack with Erg Raiders during your turn, it deals 2 damage to you at end of turn. Erg Raiders deals no damage to you the turn it comes into play on your side.

mc.name: Evil Presence
mc.oracleText:
Enchant land
Enchanted land is a Swamp.
mc.printedText: Target land becomes a basic swamp.

mc.name: Fear
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you play this. This card comes into play attached to that creature.)
Enchanted creature has fear. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
mc.printedText: Target creature cannot be blocked except by black creatures and artifact creatures.

mc.name: Frozen Shade
mc.oracleText: {B}: Frozen Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {B}: +1/+1 until end of turn
mc.flavorText:
"There are some qualities, some incorporate things, / That have a double life, which thus is made / A type of twin entity which springs / From matter and light, evinced in solid and shade."
--Edgar Allan Poe, "Silence"

mc.name: Gloom
mc.oracleText: White spells and activated abilities of white enchantments cost {3} more to play.
mc.printedText: White spells cost an additional {3} to cast. White enchantments with activation costs require an additional {3} to use.

mc.name: Greed
mc.oracleText: {B}, Pay 2 life: Draw a card.
mc.printedText: {B}: Pay 2 life to draw a card. Effects that prevent or redirect damage cannot be used to counter this loss of life.
mc.flavorText:
"There is no calamity greater than lavish desires. . . . And there is no greater disaster than greed."
--Tao Te Ching 46

mc.name: Howl from Beyond
mc.oracleText: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.

mc.name: Hypnotic Specter
mc.oracleText:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Whenever Hypnotic Specter deals damage to an opponent, that player discards a card at random.
mc.printedText:
Flying
An opponent damaged by Specter discards a card at random from his or her hand. Ignore this effect if opponent has no cards in hand.
mc.flavorText:
". . . There was no trace
Of aught on that illumined face . . . ."
--Samuel Coleridge, "Phantom"

mc.name: Junn Efreet
mc.oracleText:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Junun Efreet unless you pay {B}{B}.
mc.printedText:
Flying
During your upkeep, pay {B}{B} or bury Junun Efreet.

mc.name: Lord of the Pit
mc.oracleText:
Flying, trample (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach. If this creature would deal enough combat damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it deal the rest of its damage to defending player.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature other than Lord of the Pit. If you can't, Lord of the Pit deals 7 damage to you.
mc.printedText:
Flying, trample
During your upkeep, sacrifice a creature. If you cannot sacrifice a creature, Lord of the Pit deals 7 damage to you. You cannot sacrifice Lord of the Pit to itself.

mc.name: Lost Soul
mc.oracleText: Swampwalk
mc.printedText: Swampwalk
mc.flavorText:
Her hand gently beckons,
she whispers your name--
But those who go with her
are never the same.

mc.name: Marsh Gas
mc.oracleText: All creatures get -2/-0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: All creatures get -2/-0 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"Comes right outta th' ground. If ya can smell it, it's too late."
--Keevy Bogsbury

mc.name: Mind Twist
mc.oracleText: Target player discards X cards at random.
mc.printedText: Target player discards X cards at random from his or her hand. If that player does not have enough cards, his or her entire hand is discarded.

mc.name: Murk Dwellers
mc.oracleText: Whenever Murk Dwellers attacks and isn't blocked, it gets +2/+0 until end of combat.
mc.printedText: When attacking and not blocked, Murk Dwellers gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: When Raganorn unsealed the catacombs, he found more than the dead and their treasures.

mc.name: Nether Shadow
mc.oracleText:
Haste
At the beginning of your upkeep, if Nether Shadow is in your graveyard with three or more creature cards above it, you may put Nether Shadow into play.
mc.printedText: At the end of your upkeep, if Shadow is in your graveyard with at least three creature cards above it, you may return it to play. Shadow can attack the turn it comes into play.

mc.name: Nightmare
mc.oracleText:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Nightmare's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Swamps you control.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Nightmare has power and toughness each equal to the number of swamps its controller controls.
mc.flavorText: The Nightmare arises from its lair in the swamps. As the poisoned land spreads, so does the Nightmare's rage and terrifying strength.

mc.name: Paralyze
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
When Paralyze comes into play, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player may pay {4}. If he or she does, untap the creature.
mc.printedText: Target creature does not untap during its controller's untap phase. That player may pay an additional {4} during his or her upkeep to untap it. Tap target creatures when Paralyze comes into play.

mc.name: Pestilence
mc.oracleText:
At end of turn, if no creatures are in play, sacrifice Pestilence.

{B}: Pestilence deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.
mc.printedText:
At the end of any turn, if there are no creatures in play, bury Pestilence.
{B}: Pestilence deals 1 damage to all creatures and players.

mc.name: Pit Scorpion
mc.oracleText: Whenever Pit Scorpion deals damage to a player, that player gets a poison counter. (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)
mc.printedText: If Pit Scorpion damages a player, he or she gets a poison counter. If a player has ten or more poison counters, he or she loses the game.
mc.flavorText: Sometimes the smallest nuisance can be the greatest pain.

mc.name: Plague Rats
mc.oracleText: Plague Rats's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures named Plague Rats in play.
mc.printedText: Plague Rats has power and toughness each equal to the number of Plague Rats in play, no matter who controls them. For example, if there are two Plague Rats in play, each has power and toughness 2/2.
mc.flavorText: During the dark times, the rats seemed to grow ever stronger.

mc.name: Rag Man
mc.oracleText: {B}{B}{B}, {T}: Target opponent reveals his or her hand and discards a creature card at random. Play this ability only during your turn.
mc.printedText: {B}{B}{B}, {T}: Look at target opponent's hand. If that player has any creature cards in hand, he or she discards one of them at random. Use this ability only during your turn.
mc.flavorText: "Aw, he's just a silly, dirty little man. What's to be afraid of?"

mc.name: Raise Dead
mc.oracleText: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.printedText: Take target creature from your graveyard and put it into your hand.

mc.name: Royal Assassin
mc.oracleText: {T}: Destroy target tapped creature.
mc.printedText: {T}: Destroy target tapped creature.
mc.flavorText: Trained in the arts of stealth, the Royal Assassins choose their victims carefully, relying on timing and precision rather than brute force.

mc.name: Scathe Zombies
mc.flavorText:
"They groaned, they stirred, they all uprose,
Nor spake, nor moved their eyes;
It had been strange, even in a dream,
To have seen those dead men rise."
--Samuel Coleridge, "The Rime of the Ancient Mariner"

mc.name: Scavenging Ghoul

At end of turn, put a corpse counter on Scavenging Ghoul for each creature put into a graveyard from play that turn.
Remove a corpse counter from Scavenging Ghoul: Regenerate Scavenging Ghoul.
mc.printedText:
At the end of each turn, put a corpse counter on Scavenging Ghoul for each creature put into the graveyard during that turn.
{0}: Remove a corpse counter from Scavenging Ghoul to regenerate it.

Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

Flying

mc.printedText: All damage done to you so far this turn is instead retroactively applied to a target creature you control. Further damage this turn is treated normally.

mc.name: Sorceress Queen

mc.printedText: {T}: Target creature other than Sorceress Queen becomes 0/2 until end of turn.

Enchant creature

mc.printedText: Put a -0/-2 counter on target creature every time it becomes tapped. These counters remain even if Spirit Shackle is removed.

mc.name: Terror
mc.oracleText: Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
mc.printedText: Bury target non-black, non-artifact creature.

mc.name: Uncle Istvan
mc.oracleText: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Uncle Istvan by creatures.
mc.printedText: All damage done to Uncle Istvan by creatures is reduced to 0.
mc.flavorText: Solitude drove the old hermit insane. Now he only keeps company with those he can catch.

mc.name: Unholy Strength
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you play this. This card comes into play attached to that creature.)
Enchanted creature gets +2/+1.
mc.printedText: Target creature gets +2/+1.

mc.name: Vampire Bats
mc.oracleText:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

mc.printedText:
Flying
{B}: +1/+0 until end of turn. You cannot spend more than {B}{B} in this way each turn.
mc.flavorText:
"For something is amiss or out of place
When mice with wings can wear a human face."
--Theodore Roethke, "The Bat"

Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{B}: Regenerate Wall of Bone.
mc.printedText: {B}: Regenerate
mc.flavorText: The Wall of Bone is said to be an aspect of the Great Wall in Hel, where the bones of all sinners wait for Ragnarok, when Hela will call them forth for the final battle.

Enchant artifact

Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.)

Flying
{B}: Regenerate
mc.flavorText:
"About, about in reel and rout
The death-fires danced at night;
The water, like a witch's oils,

--Samuel Coleridge, "The Rime of the Ancient Mariner"

mc.name: Word of Binding
mc.oracleText: Tap X target creatures.
mc.printedText: Tap X target creatures.
mc.flavorText:
"That was the worst experience of my days: standing there helpless as they killed my whole troop."
--Maeveen O'Donagh, Memoirs of a Soldier

mc.printedText: {T}: Target non-creature artifact becomes an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its casting cost. Target retains all original abilities. This change lasts until your next upkeep.

mc.name: Zombie Master

Other Zombie creatures have swampwalk.

mc.printedText:
All zombies gain swampwalk and

mc.name: Air Elemental
mc.oracleText: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
mc.printedText: Flying
mc.flavorText: These spirits of the air are winsome and wild and cannot be truly contained. Only marginally intelligent, they often substitute whimsy for strategy, delighting in mischief and mayhem.

Enchant artifact
Enchanted artifact is a creature with power and toughness each equal to its converted mana cost. It's still an artifact.
mc.printedText: Target artifact becomes an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its casting cost; target retains all its original abilities. Animate Artifact does not affect artifact creatures.

mc.printedText: {U}, {T}: Add {3} to your mana pool. Play this ability as an interrupt.

mc.printedText: Target player must draw all mana from his or her available lands; then, all mana in target player's mana pool drains into your mana pool.

mc.printedText: Tap target creature you control. Add an amount of colorless mana equal to that creature's casting cost to your mana pool.

mc.printedText: During his or her upkeep, target land's controller pays {1} or 1 life, or target land is destroyed. Effects that prevent or redirect damage cannot be used to counter this loss of life.

Enchant enchantment

Enchant creature (Target a creature as you play this. This card comes into play attached to that creature.)

mc.name: Flood
mc.oracleText: {U}{U}: Tap target creature without flying.
mc.printedText: {U}{U}: Tap target creature without flying.
mc.flavorText:
"A dash of cool water does wonders to clear a cluttered battlefield."
--Vibekke Ragnild, Witches and War

mc.name: Gaseous Form
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by enchanted creature.
mc.printedText: Target creature neither deals nor receives damage during combat.
mc.flavorText:
" . . . And gives to airy nothing
A local habitation and a name."
--William Shakespeare, A Midsummer-Night's Dream

mc.name: Ghost Ship
mc.oracleText:
Flying
{U}{U}{U}: Regenerate Ghost Ship.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{U}{U}{U}: Regenerate
mc.flavorText:
"That phantom prow split the storm as lightning cast its long shadow on the battlefield below."
--Mireille Gaetane, The Valeriad

mc.name: Giant Tortoise
mc.oracleText: Giant Tortoise gets +0/+3 as long as it's untapped.
mc.printedText: Giant Tortoise gets +0/+3 while untapped.

mc.name: Hurkyl's Recall
mc.oracleText: Return all artifacts target player owns to his or her hand.
mc.printedText: All artifacts in play owned by target player are returned to that player's hand.
mc.flavorText: This spell, like many attributed to Drafna, was actually the work of his wife and former student, Hurkyl.

mc.name: Island Fish Jasconius
mc.oracleText:
Island Fish Jasconius can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
Jasconius doesn't untap during your untap step.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {U}{U}{U}. If you do, untap Jasconius.

mc.printedText:
Does not untap during your untap phase.
Cannot attack if defending player controls no islands. If at any time you control no islands, bury Island Fish Jasconius.
{U}{U}{U}: Untap Island Fish. Use this ability only during your upkeep.

mc.name: Jump
mc.oracleText: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

mc.name: Leviathan

Trample
Leviathan comes into play tapped and doesn't untap during your untap step.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice two Islands. If you do, untap Leviathan.
Leviathan can't attack unless you sacrifice two Islands.
mc.printedText:
Trample
Comes into play tapped and does not untap during your untap phase.
During your upkeep, you may sacrifice two islands to untap Leviathan.
Leviathan cannot attack unless you sacrifice two islands during your attack.

mc.name: Lifetap
mc.oracleText: Whenever a Forest an opponent controls becomes tapped, you gain 1 life.
mc.printedText: Gain 1 life each time a forest controlled by target opponent becomes tapped.

mc.name: Lord of Atlantis
mc.oracleText: Other Merfolk creatures get +1/+1 and have islandwalk.
mc.printedText: All Merfolk gain islandwalk and get +1/+1.
mc.flavorText: A master of tactics, the Lord of Atlantis makes his people bold in battle merely by arriving to lead them.

mc.name: Magical Hack
mc.oracleText: Change the text of target spell or permanent by replacing all instances of one basic land type with another. (For example, you may change "swampwalk" to "plainswalk.") (This effect doesn't end at end of turn.)
mc.printedText: Change the text of target spell or target permanent by replacing all occurrences of one basic land type with another. For example, you may change "swampwalk" to "plainswalk."

mc.name: Mahamoti Djinn
mc.oracleText: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
mc.printedText: Flying
mc.flavorText: Of royal blood among the spirits of the air, the Mahamoti Djinn rides on the wings of the winds. As dangerous in the gambling hall as he is in battle, he is a master of trickery and misdirection.

mc.name: Mana Short
mc.oracleText: Tap all lands target player controls and empty his or her mana pool.
mc.printedText: Mana Short empties target player's mana pool and taps that player's lands.

mc.name: Merfolk of the Pearl Trident
mc.flavorText: Most human scholars believe that Merfolk are the survivors of sunken Atlantis, humans adapted to the water. Merfolk, however, believe that humans sprang forth from Merfolk who adapted themselves in order to explore their last frontier.

mc.name: Mind Bomb
mc.oracleText: Each player may discard up to three cards. Mind Bomb deals damage to each player equal to 3 minus the number of cards he or she discarded this way.
mc.printedText: Mind Bomb deals 3 damage to each player. All players may discard up to three cards of their choice from their hands. Each card a player discards in this manner prevents 1 damage to that player from Mind Bomb.

mc.name: Phantasmal Forces
mc.oracleText:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Phantasmal Forces unless you pay {U}.
mc.printedText:
Flying
During your upkeep, pay {U} or destroy Phantasmal Forces.
mc.flavorText: These beings embody the essence of true heroes long dead. Summoned from the dreamrealms, they rise to meet their enemies.

mc.name: Phantasmal Terrain
mc.oracleText:
Enchant land
As Phantasmal Terrain comes into play, choose a basic land type.
Enchanted land is the chosen type.
mc.printedText: Target land becomes any basic land type of your choice.

mc.name: Phantom Monster
mc.oracleText: Flying
mc.printedText: Flying
mc.flavorText:
"While, like a ghastly rapid river,
Through the pale door,
A hideous throng rush out forever,
And laugh--but smile no more."
--Edgar Allan Poe, "The Haunted Palace"

mc.name: Pirate Ship

Pirate Ship can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.

Cannot attack if defending player controls no islands. If at any time you control no islands, bury Pirate Ship.
{T}: Pirate Ship deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

Enchant enchantment

mc.printedText: During the upkeep of target enchantment's controller, Power Leak deals 2 damage to him or her. That player may pay {1} for each damage he or she wishes to prevent from Power Leak.

mc.name: Power Sink
mc.oracleText: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If he or she doesn't, that player taps all lands he or she controls and empties his or her mana pool.
mc.printedText: Counter a target spell if its caster does not pay {X}. Target spell's caster must draw and pay all available mana from lands and mana pool until {X} is paid; he or she may also pay mana from other sources if desired.

mc.name: Prodigal Sorcerer
mc.oracleText: {T}: Prodigal Sorcerer deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText: {T}: Prodigal Sorcerer deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText: Occasionally a member of the Institute of Arcane Study acquires a taste for worldly pleasures. Seldom do they have trouble finding employment.

mc.name: Psionic Entity
mc.oracleText: {T}: Psionic Entity deals 2 damage to target creature or player and 3 damage to itself.
mc.printedText: {T}: Psionic Entity deals 2 damage to target creature or player and 3 damage to itself.
mc.flavorText: Creatures of the Aether are notorious for neglecting their own well-being.

mc.name: Psychic Venom

Enchant land

"O it is excellent
To have a giant's strength, but it is tyrannous
To use it like a giant."

mc.flavorText: To become king of the Goblins, one must assassinate the previous king. Thus, only the most foolish seek positions of leadership.

Trample

Trample
Cannot attack if defending player controls no mountains. Rock Sled does not untap during your untap phase if it attacked during your last turn.

mc.name: Gray Ogre
mc.flavorText: The Ogre philosopher Gnerdel believed the purpose of life was to live as high on the food chain as possible. She refused to eat vegetarians, preferring to live entirely on creatures that preyed on sentient beings.

mc.name: Hill Giant
mc.flavorText: Fortunately, Hill Giants have large blind spots in which a human can easily hide. Unfortunately, these blind spots are beneath the bottoms of their feet.

mc.name: Hurloon Minotaur
mc.flavorText: The Minotaurs of the Hurloon Mountains are known for their love of battle. They are also known for their hymns to the dead, sung for friend and foe alike. These hymns can last for days, filling the mountain valleys with their low, haunting sounds.

mc.name: Hurr Jackal
mc.oracleText: {T}: Target creature can't be regenerated this turn.
mc.printedText: {T}: Target creature cannot regenerate this turn.

mc.name: Immolation
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature

mc.printedText: Target creature gets +2/-2.

mc.name: Inferno
mc.oracleText: Inferno deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.
mc.printedText: Inferno deals 6 damage to all players and all creatures.
mc.flavorText:
"Any scrap of compassion that still existed in my soul was permanently snuffed out when they cast me out into the flames."
--Mairsil, called the Pretender

mc.name: Ironclaw Orcs
mc.oracleText: Ironclaw Orcs can't block creatures with power 2 or greater.
mc.printedText: Cannot be assigned to block any creature with power greater than 1.
mc.flavorText: Generations of genetic weeding have given rise to the deviously cowardly Ironclaw clan. To say that Orcs in general are vicious, depraved, and ignoble does not do justice to the Ironclaw.

mc.name: Keldon Warlord
mc.oracleText: Keldon Warlord's power and toughness are each equal to the number of non-Wall creatures you control.
mc.printedText: Keldon Warlord has power and toughness each equal to the number of non-wall creatures you control, including Warlord. For example, if you control two other non-wall creatures, Warlord is 3/3. If one of those creatures leaves play, Warlord immediately becomes 2/2.

mc.name: Lightning Bolt
mc.oracleText: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

Blue creatures don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.
Blue creatures have "At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {4}. If you do, untap this creature."
mc.printedText: Blue creatures do not untap during their controllers' untap phase. During his or her upkeep, a player may pay an additional {4} to untap a blue creature he or she controls.

mc.name: Mana Clash
mc.oracleText: You and target opponent each flip a coin. Mana Clash deals 1 damage to each player whose coin comes up tails. Repeat this process until both players' coins come up heads on the same flip.
mc.printedText: You and target opponent each flip a coin. Mana Clash deals 1 damage to any player whose coin comes up tails. Repeat this process until both players' coins come up heads at the same time.

mc.name: Mana Flare
mc.oracleText: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, that player adds one mana of that type to his or her mana pool.
mc.printedText: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, it produces one additional mana of the same type.

mc.name: Manabarbs
mc.oracleText: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, Manabarbs deals 1 damage to that player.
mc.printedText: Each time any land is tapped for mana, Manabarbs deals 1 damage to that land's controller.

mc.name: Mons's Goblin Raiders
mc.flavorText: The intricate dynamics of Rundvelt Goblin affairs are often confused with anarchy. The chaos, however, is the chaos of a thundercloud, and direction will sporadically and violently appear. Pashalik Mons and his Raiders are the thunderhead that leads in the storm.

mc.name: Orcish Artillery
mc.oracleText: {T}: Orcish Artillery deals 2 damage to target creature or player and 3 damage to you.
mc.printedText: {T}: Orcish Artillery deals 2 damage to target creature or player and 3 damage to you.
mc.flavorText: In a rare display of ingenuity, the Orcs invented an incredibly destructive weapon. Most Orcish artillerists are those who dared criticize its effectiveness.

mc.name: Orcish Oriflamme

mc.printedText: All attacking creatures you control get +1/+0.

mc.printedText: During each player's upkeep, Power Surge deals that player 1 damage for each land he or she controls that was untapped at the beginning of the turn, before the untap phase.

mc.name: Pyrotechnics
mc.oracleText: Pyrotechnics deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players.
mc.printedText: Pyrotechnics deals 4 damage divided any way you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players.
mc.flavorText:
"Hi ni ya Behold the man of flint, that's me
Four lightnings zigzag from me, strike and return."
--Navajo war chant

{T}, Sacrifice Tempest Efreet: Target opponent may pay 10 life. If that player doesn't, he or she reveals a card at random from his or her hand.
